data.name: Improved logo animation
data.description: A dynamic SVG logo animation created using animateTransform and path elements. The project emphasizes smooth, hardware-accelerated motion and clean markup, with a focus on accessibility and maintainable code structure.

data.name: Pencil with wings
data.description: An expressive SVG emoji depicting a pencil with wings, built using SVG features like clipPath and semantic  tags. The design ensures both visual and code clarity.

data.name: Penrose triangle
data.description: A geometric composition leveraging Snap.svg to layer gradients and paths. The project explores dynamic color blending and shape construction, balancing aesthetics with efficient, readable JavaScript-driven SVG code.

data.name: CV template
data.description: A modern CV template featuring a responsive layout, theme switching, and a custom SVG-based skills graph. The design integrates UI/UX best practices with advanced SVG path manipulation for a polished, interactive user experience.

data.name: Countdown
data.description: An interactive countdown timer combining SVG graphics with accessible form controls. The timer synchronizes SVG transforms with user input, using animation, accessibility, and UI logic.

data.name: Power
data.description: A minimal SVG power button featuring a smooth animated transition. The project highlights clean design and straightforward SVG animation for an intuitive user interaction.
